name: Tawako The Forest Hedgehog
description:
This game will remind you of old-style Arkanoid-like or "pong" games.
Your task is to prevent the ball from falling by controlling the Hedgehog named Tawako.
By catching fruits you can get bonuses or power-ups hidden in special blocks.


Key features:
  • Peaceful design and relaxing music.
  • You can get bonuses by collecting falling fruits and nuts. Do not miss them!
  • The longer you keep the ball from falling, the faster it moves. Be careful!
  • Collect all letters to reveal a secret!
